name: Nanjing Museum
description: As one of China's three major museums, it houses 430,000 cultural relics and boasts a very rich collection of exhibits. It's a must-visit for history enthusiasts！
address: 321 Zhongshan East Road, Xuanwu District, Nanjing City
openingHours: Tuesday to Sunday, 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM (last entry at 4:00 PM)

name: Confucius Temple
description: Nanjing's most famous spot for night views, with stunning lantern displays, delicious street food, and scenic painted boats！
address: Gongyuan Street, Qinhuai District, Nanjing City

name: Sun Yat-sen Mausoleum
description: Sun Yat-sen's mausoleum is a magnificent architectural structure with 392 steps, and the ginkgo trees are incredibly beautiful in the autumn！
address: 7 Shixiang Road, Xuanwu District, Nanjing City
